entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, 0.7°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this morning. Risk of freezing rain this morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022
